Name: Regrowth
About the game: Regrowth is a puzzle game where you race against time to save islands from sinking. Use plants and animals, collect and channel water... However, only with strategy and optimisation can you solve all the levels. Will you be able to save the earthen realm? Watch out for ponds and rain because having water for your plants is crucial in these dry times! Use different plants and tools, optimise your positioning and timing. Planting a plant at the wrong place could lose you the island! Time your decisions and manage your water supply well because the land dries, the time is limited, and the seasons change!
